/* ID : contents_sql.MainVideo_MainVideoList DEC : 메인피드 컨텐츠 리스트 조회 */
SELECT a.MAIN_VIDEO_IDX, a.FILE_CONTENT_IDX, b.FILE_NAME, b.THUMBNAIL_PATH, a.ORDER_SEQ, a.ACTIVE_YN, a.MOD_DATE FROM main_video a INNER JOIN file_content b ON a.FILE_CONTENT_IDX = b.FILE_CONTENT_IDX WHERE IFNULL(a.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(b.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND b.cont_type = 'V'
AND b.FILE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sSearch},'%')
ORDER BY a.ORDER_SEQ DESC
